CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 16, 1952, pg. 7 reads: "Pittsburgh Conference Leaders - Presiding elders, pastor, evangelists and conference branch leaders responded to a call of Bishop A.J. Allen for a special meeting last Thursday in the all purpose room at Bethel AME Church, the Rev. A.A. Hughey, pastor. Seated on the front seat, left to right: J. Walker Storms, Bishop Allen, Mrs. Alma A. Polk, who is connectional director of Young People's Activities; C.N. Thompson and B.M. McLinn.  These three are presiding elders of the conference. The Rev. Mr. Hughey, pastor of the church, is standing in the rear. - Harris PHoto."
TitMainTitle: Men and women, including seated in front row, from left: J. Walker Storms, Bishop A. J. Allen, Alma A. Polk, C. N. Thompson, and B. M. McLinn, and Rev. Andrew A. Hughey standing in rear, gathered in Bethel AME Church for conference
